title: Secret Self-Practice!
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Huff, huff.... You’re amazing, Hanamaru-chan. You can still go for more?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>It’s getting hard for me too, but we only need to do it one more time zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I’m sorry I wasn’t very helpful, even though you let me practice with you....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>That’s not true! Maru was the one who asked you to accompany me on my secret self-practice. Maru learned a lot from watching how you do it zura, Ayumu-san! So don’t say that<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Hanamaru-chan.... Fufu, thank you. I’ll do my best for the last one!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Yeah! Speaking of which, Ayumu-san. If you’re looking to improve your stamina, Maru thinks you should ask Kanan-chan for a training plan. Maru got much fitter than the first time because of her training plan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I see.... Okay. I’ll try asking her next time. But for now, let’s both do our best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Last one zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Hauuu~.... Maru is at.... my limit zura....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Here, Hanamaru-chan. I made honey lemon, so please have some. It’ll refresh you, and the amino acid will help get rid of your fatigue quickly<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Uwaaaah~! Just looking at it already makes my fatigue disappear zura~! Thanks for the food!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
